content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 12: Public buses have started operating their services from Gongabu-based New Bus Park from today. Public transport service, which was closed after the government issued prohibitory order and curfew in the aftermath of the GenZ protest launched on September 8 and 9, has been resumed g

title: Public buses start operating their service from New Bus Park
